scoring_rules: +1 VP per wonder stage you built; +1 VP per wonder stage your neighbors built
description: Guild of builders, scores for wonder constructions

scoring_rules: +1 VP per set of3 identical scientific symbols; +2 VP per set of3 different symbols
description: Guild of scientists, scores scientific sets

scoring_rules: +1 VP per brown/grey card you own; +2 coins when you build a brown card
description: Guild of craftsmen, rewards resource cards

scoring_rules: +1 VP per yellow card you own; +1 coin from left neighbor when trading
+1 VP per military victory token you own; +1 coin per military shield
description: Guild of spies, rewards military success

scoring_rules: +1 VP per red card you own; +1 VP per blue card in neighbors
+1 VP per symbol on your ships; +2 coins when constructing ships
